      • getPageForRecord

        public Object getPageForRecord(int bytesRequired)
        Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
        Finds a block with enough free space to hold the given number of bytes.
        Specified by:
        getPageForRecord in interface Strategy
        Specified by:
        getPageForRecord in class AbstractStrategy
        Parameters:
        bytesRequired - The free space needed, in bytes.
        Returns:
        Id of the Page or null, if no such page exists.

      • init

        public void init(SortedMap pages,
                 int pageSize,
                 int maxObjectSize)
        Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
        Initializes the strategy. This call must be made, before the first real (other) operation is performed. The call can also be made multiple times.
        Specified by:
        init in interface Strategy
        Overrides:
        init in class AbstractStrategy
        Parameters:
        pages - SortedMap with key pageId and value of type PageInformation.
        pageSize - size of each page in bytes.
        maxObjectSize - Size of the largest record which can be stored inside the RecordManager.

      • pageRemoved

        public void pageRemoved(Object pageId,
                        RecordManager.PageInformation pi)
        Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
        Informs the strategy, that a page has been deleted by the RecordManager.
        Specified by:
        pageRemoved in interface Strategy
        Overrides:
        pageRemoved in class AbstractStrategy
        Parameters:
        pageId - identifyer of the page which has been removed.
        pi - PageInformation for the page.

      • recordUpdated

        public void recordUpdated(Object pageId,
                          RecordManager.PageInformation pi,
                          short recordNumber,
                          int recordsAdded,
                          int bytesAdded,
                          int linkRecordsAdded)
        Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
        Informs the strategy, that the RecordManager has performed an update on a certain page. size==-1 means removal.
        Specified by:
        recordUpdated in interface Strategy
        Overrides:
        recordUpdated in class AbstractStrategy
        Parameters:
        pageId - identifyer of the page where an update has occured.
        pi - PageInformation for the page.
        recordNumber - number of the record which has been changed.
        recordsAdded - number of records which were added.
        bytesAdded - number of added bytes inside the Page (can be negative).
        linkRecordsAdded - number of link records added.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
        Closes the strategy. After closing, the state of the strategy still has to be convertable.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Strategy
        Overrides:
        close in class AbstractStrategy

      • read

        public void read(DataInput dataInput)
          throws IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
        For most of the strategy, the pages-map is sufficient to work. If more state information has to be stored, then the methods read and write have to be overwritten.
        Specified by:
        read in interface Convertable
        Overrides:
        read in class AbstractStrategy
        Parameters:
        dataInput - DataInput which is used to reconstruct the strategy.
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O errors occur.

      • write

        public void write(DataOutput dataOutput)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
        For most of the strategy, the pages-map is sufficient to work. If more state information has to be stored, then the methods read and write have to be overwritten.
        Specified by:
        write in interface Convertable
        Overrides:
        write in class AbstractStrategy
        Parameters:
        dataOutput - DataOutput which is used to store the state of the strategy.
        Throws:
        IOException - includes any I/O exceptions that may occur.
